channel.title: Escaped-PVP Development Team
channel.description:
Escaped-pvp is a brand new server, established in 2013. It's up 24/7 hosted on a powerfull Dedicated VPS. The owner is larry, one of the best developers around at rune-server. we have opened only 2 days ago and were 46th on runetoplist.a great community. We're here to offer people a great time on our server which has alot of features which are listed below. We're using the Hyperion base. We've got experience staff, handpicked by the owners. This server is great if you like to pk/skill, boss kills, it contains 23 skills 100% working, no bugs/glitches. We have daily events, hosted by people from the server. need staff also, we only have admins atm.
SERVER FEATURES
Features:
[ul][li]- 24.7 Uptime[/li] [li]- Vote4cash[/li] [li]- Webclient[/li] [li]- x2 voting points[/li] [li]- Active helpful staff[/li] [li]- 3 levels of donor status[/li] [li]- Regular updates!, daily every 2 days.[/li] [li]- Completely Lag Free![/li] [li]- Summoning[/li] [li]- 100% working leeches[/li] [li]- Runescape like Combat[/li] [li]- Working Korasi’s Sword[/li] [li]- Multi Barrages[/li] [li]- Xp Counter[/li] [li]- Working weapon specs and effects[/li] [li]- Working curses prayer book, including turmoil![/li] [li]- All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars[/li] [li]- All Spirit shields working, Even their affects.[/li] [li]- Working Teleblock[/li] [li]- Staff of light Special[/li] [li]- Yell with custom tags[/li] [li]- Daily Tournament Events[/li] [li]- Full Jad (63 Waves)[/li] [li]- Full Fight Kiln (36 Waves)[/li] [li]- full nex with 13 animations[/li] [li]- full nomad working perfectly with animations[/li] [li]- Minigames, duel arena\ barrows\ ect[/li] [li]- Excellent Pking[/li] [li]- Active forums[/li][/ul]
Code format to be allowed to be part of escaped-pvp. [code] Name: Age: Experience: Language: Country: do you understand in basic java: how many years have you been coding: [/code]

item.title: Escaped-PVP Development Team
item.dc:creator: @serversdownload serversdownload
item.description:
@serversdownload wrote:

thank you.

we always have 3-5 players on at most of the times.

still needing a coder
